author: baget
body:
The MSIX Packages are missing from Powershell 7.0 Release

# Steps to reproduce

```
goto https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/releases/tag/v7.0.0
search for msix packages
```

# Expected behavior

```none
having the MSIX package in github release page
```

# Actual behavior

```none
No MSIX packages in github release page
```

# Environment data

<!-- provide the output of $PSVersionTable -->

```none

```

comments.author: SteveL-MSFT
comments.body: In progress.  We found an issue during the regular release which necessitated a specific fix and rebuild.  No ETA.

comments.author: wbpluto
comments.body: Waiting for MSIX package :) as well as release to the Microsoft Store!

comments.author: fredskis
comments.body:
> Waiting for MSIX package :) as well as release to the Microsoft Store!

Waiting here too. My poor Surface Pro X is still on v7.0.0-rc.3

comments.author: wenqiangx325
comments.body: How about now? I'm wating here.

comments.author: Nirmal4G
comments.body: @SteveL-MSFT Will 7.0 servicing or the 7.1 LTS have an MSIX package published and eventually be available in the Windows Store?

comments.author: o-l-a-v
comments.body:
Ref. the PS community call yesterday, I wanted to add some reasons for you to release 7.0 GA as MSIX as well as in the Microsoft Store (which currently was the only target for a MSIX release for 7.0 GA). * MSIX App Attach with Windows Virtual Desktop * https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/virtual-desktop/app-attach * https://microsoftplatform.blogspot.com/2019/10/msix-app-attach-will-fundamentally.html * MSIX deployment with Intune (not everyone wants to use Microsoft Store) * https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/windows/msix/desktop/managing-your-msix-deployment-intune
Windows Virtual Desktop MSIX app attach - Azure
How to set up MSIX app attach for Windows Virtual Desktop.
MSIX app attach will fundamentally change working with application landscapes on Windows Virtual Desktop!
In this article I want to explain why I believe this to be true, cover what MSIX app attach is and how it uses MSIX technology to empower ...
Microsoft Intune - MSIX
This guide provides instruction on how to create and deploy an MSIX app with Microsoft Intune

comments.author: therealderrickd
comments.body: Hows is this STILL not resolved?

comments.author: SteveL-MSFT
comments.body: We're still waiting on another team to publish the right cert to sign the msix pkg.  No ETA.

comments.author: darrenjrobinson
comments.body:
@SteveL-MSFT when you publish it, can you please also include Hololens as a target platform. 

e.g **TargetDeviceFamily Name="Windows.Holographic"**

comments.author: SteveL-MSFT
comments.body: The 7.1 preview.6 release has been published to the Store.  It was made available for Windows.Holographic but it appears it can't actually start and that's likely due to conhost not being on that device.  I'll unmark Windows.Holographic as a supported device for next update.  Working on publishing 7.0.4 to Store once that is available.

title: Missing MSIX Packages from Powershell 7.0 Release
